description:
Set up Storybook for the Next.js frontend with pre-recorded WebSocket message sequences from real agent runs. Allow developers to test UI components against different agent states, errors, and streaming patterns without running the backend.

**Rationale:** Frontend development currently requires a running backend and triggering actual agent workflows to test UI states. Storybook with mocked agent responses would enable rapid UI iteration and visual regression testing independently of backend availability.
title: Frontend Component Storybook with Mock Agent Responses
